arts.ttl: Swansea hit back to win at Blackburn - free highlights and report
arts.sum: Goncalo Franco's blockbuster finish helped Swansea come from behind to beat Blackburn 2-1 in the Championship, with Rovers left raging after a late penalty appeal was waved away.

arts.sum: Blackburn and Swansea are both in the bottom half of the Championship and Elliott Bretland believes they could cancel each other out on Tuesday
